Views¶

reader.views.check_book(book_name: str)¶

The function returns the path to the book with the passed title. If there is no such book, it returns an empty string.

reader.views.read_page(request, book: str, page: int)¶

Function returning the page view of the reader

bookmanage.views.moderator_page_check(request)¶

A function that returns the moderation page of the application.

bookmanage.views.moderator_page_list(request)¶

A function that returns a page with a list of requests awaiting moderation.

bookmanage.views.user_page_download(request)¶

A function that returns the book’s download page.

bookmanage.views.user_page_list(request)¶

A function that returns a page with a list of abandoned requests.

bookmanage.views.user_page_proposal(request, status)¶

Function that returns the page of the request with its current status.

registration.views.input_err(request, errors: list)¶

Accepts the list of errors made when entering registration data, displays the corresponding messages to the user

registration.views.personal_account_page(request)¶

Function displaying the personal account page

registration.views.registration_confirm(request, name_fields: str, mail_field: str, pass_field: str, pass_conf_field: str)¶

The function takes the current values of the page fields, checks them, and then either puts them into the database or triggers an error output.

registration.views.start_registration_page(request)¶

Function that displays the registration page

fullest_library.views.book_page(request, book_name: str)¶

A function that returns the page of a book

fullest_library.views.catalog_page(request)¶

A function that returns a catalog page

fullest_library.views.change_book_status(request)¶

Function for changing the status of a book in the personal library

fullest_library.views.main_page(request)¶

A function that returns the home page

fullest_library.views.personal_library_page(request)¶

A function that returns the page of a personal bibliography

fullest_library.views.search(request, search_text: str)¶

Search function to find a book, author or tag by text
